channel.title: How to make it so only adminstrators/moderators can use the command
channel.description:
Well if you want to make it so only adminstrators can use the command ::food for example then follow my tutorial, (Oh and If you want it so moderators can use it just replace the number "2" with the number "1")
[b]317 Solution:[/b] Simply just put the [code]&& playerRights >= 2) {[/code] Right next to the code [code]if(command.startsWith("food")[/code] And it will turn out like this [code]if(command.startsWith("food")&& playerRights >= 2) {[/code]
[b]508 Solution:[/b] It's Simple Just Put The [code]&& p.rights > 2) {[/code] Right Next to the code [code]} else if(cmd[0].equals("food")[/code] And it will turn out like this [code]} else if(cmd[0].equals("food") && p.rights > 0) {[/code]

item.title: How to make it so only adminstrators/moderators can use the command
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Well if you want to make it so only adminstrators can use the command ::food for example
then follow my tutorial, (Oh and If you want it so moderators can use it just replace the number “2” with the number “1”)

317 Solution: Simply just put the && playerRights >= 2) { Right next to the code if(command.startsWith("food")
And it will turn out like this if(command.startsWith("food")&& playerRights >= 2) {

508 Solution: It’s Simple Just Put The && p.rights > 2) { Right Next to the code } else if(cmd[0].equals("food") And it will turn out like this } else if(cmd[0].equals("food") && p.rights > 0) {

Read full topic
